sentences.en: All these motives have made me a passionate pacifist and anti militarist.
sentences.cn: 这些动机使我变成强烈的和平主义者与反黩武主义者.

sentences.en: David's play was amusing and its pacifist angle had a great appeal.
sentences.cn: 戴维的剧本很有趣,剧中的和平主义倾向性有很大的吸引力.

sentences.en: During the war his pacifist leanings were not helpful.
sentences.cn: 战时他的和平主义思想派不上用场。

sentences.en: I've never met such an ardent pacifist as Terry.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过像特里这样热情的和平主义者.

sentences.en: Later he was to become famous as a pacifist.
sentences.cn: 后来他就变成了一位知名的和平主义者。

sentences.en: Many protesters insist they are pacifists, opposed to war in all forms.
sentences.cn: 许多抗议者坚持说他们是和平主义者，反对一切形式的战争。

sentences.en: Pacifist movements gathered strength in Norway.
sentences.cn: 在挪威,和平主义的运动力量逐渐增强.

words.tran_cn: 和平主义者；反战主义者

trans.tran_cn: 和平主义者，反战主义者，绥靖主义者，持消极态度者
trans.tran_en: someone who believes that wars are wrong and who refuses to use violence
